nodes.name: project
nodes.description: Any specifically defined piece of work that is undertaken or attempted to meet a single requirement. (NCIt C47885)

properties.name: date_collected
properties.description: The date or date range in which the project data was collected.

properties.name: code
properties.description: Unique identifier for the project.

properties.name: intended_release_date
properties.description: Tracks a Project's intended release date.

properties.name: support_id
properties.description: The ID of the source providing support/grant resources.

properties.name: releasable
properties.description: A project can only be released by the user when `releasable` is true.

properties.name: released
properties.description: To release a project is to tell to include all submitted entities in the next index.

properties.name: availability_type
properties.description: Is the project open or restricted?

properties.name: dbgap_accession_number
properties.description: The dbgap accession number provided for the project.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Display name/brief description for the project.

properties.name: investigator_affiliation
properties.description: The investigator's affiliation with respect to a research institution.

properties.name: availability_mechanism
properties.description: Mechanism by which the project will be made avilable.

properties.name: support_source
properties.description: The name of source providing support/grant resources.

properties.name: investigator_name
properties.description: Name of the principal investigator for the project.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'project' table.

nodes.name: family
nodes.description: Collection of all data related to the family members and their relationships.

properties.name: cohort_id
properties.description: The study subgroup that the participant belongs to. This indicates whether the participant was a postmortem donor, an organ donor, or a surgical donor.

properties.name: melanomas_in_family
properties.description: Number of relates diagnosed with melanomas.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'family' table.

properties.name: family.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'family' table.

nodes.name: family_pedigree
nodes.description: Data file containing the pedigree description for the family.

properties.name: data_category
properties.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.

properties.name: data_type
properties.description: Specific content type of the data file.

properties.name: data_format
properties.description: Format of the data files.

properties.name: family.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'family' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'family_pedigree' table.

properties.name: md5sum
properties.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number used as a file's digital fingerprint.

properties.name: file_name
properties.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).

properties.name: object_id
properties.description: The GUID of the object in the index service.

properties.name: file_size
properties.description: The size of the data file (object) in bytes.

properties.name: family_pedigree.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'family_pedigree' table.

nodes.name: case
nodes.description: The collection of all data related to a specific subject in the context of a specific project.

properties.name: relationship_to_proband
properties.description: The subgroup that describes the state of connectedness between members of the unit of society organized around kinship ties.

properties.name: melanoma_status
properties.description: Boolean value to determine if the case has melanoma.

properties.name: is_proband
properties.description: Boolean value to determine if the case is the proband.

properties.name: family.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'family' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'case' table.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'case' table.

nodes.name: demographic
nodes.description: Data for the characterization of the patient by means of segementing the population (e.g., characterization by age, sex, or race).

properties.name: gender
properties.description: Text designations that identify gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles. [Explanatory Comment 1: Identification of gender is based upon self-report and may come from a form, questionnaire, interview, etc.]

properties.name: year_of_birth
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the calendar year in which an individual was born.

properties.name: race
properties.description: An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species. It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution. The provided values are based on the categories defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Business and used by the U.S. Census Bureau.

properties.name: ethnicity
properties.description: An individual's self-described social and cultural grouping, specifically whether an individual describes themselves as Hispanic or Latino. The provided values are based on the categories defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Business and used by the U.S. Census Bureau.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'demographic' table.

properties.name: demographic.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'demographic' table.

nodes.name: sample
nodes.description: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

properties.name: sample_type_id
properties.description: The accompanying sample type id for the sample type.

properties.name: biospecimen_anatomic_site
properties.description: Text term that represents the name of the primary disease site of the submitted tumor sample.

properties.name: oct_embedded
properties.description: Indicator of whether or not the sample was embedded in Optimal Cutting Temperature (OCT) compound.

properties.name: tumor_code_id
properties.description: BCR-defined id code for the tumor sample.

properties.name: intermediate_dimension
properties.description: Intermediate dimension of the sample, in millimeters.

properties.name: sample_volume
properties.description: The volume of the sample in mL.

properties.name: is_ffpe
properties.description: Indicator to signify whether or not the tissue sample was fixed in formalin and embedded in paraffin (FFPE).

properties.name: tumor_descriptor
properties.description: A description of the tumor from which the sample was derived.

properties.name: sample_type
properties.description: Characterization of the sample as either clinical or contrived.

properties.name: time_between_excision_and_freezing
properties.description: Numeric representation of the elapsed time between the excision and freezing of the sample, measured in minutes.

properties.name: diagnosis_pathologically_confirmed
properties.description: The histologic description of tissue or cells confirmed by a pathology review of frozen or formalin fixed slide(s) completed after the diagnostic pathology review of the tumor sample used to extract analyte(s).

properties.name: current_weight
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the current weight of the sample, measured  in milligrams.

properties.name: composition
properties.description: Text term that represents the cellular composition of the sample.

properties.name: time_between_clamping_and_freezing
properties.description: Numeric representation of the elapsed time between the surgical clamping of blood supply and freezing of the sample, measured in minutes.

properties.name: shortest_dimension
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the shortest dimension of the sample, measured in millimeters.

properties.name: method_of_sample_procurement
properties.description: The method used to procure the sample used to extract analyte(s).

properties.name: tumor_code
properties.description: Diagnostic tumor code of the tissue sample source.

properties.name: tissue_type
properties.description: Text term that represents a description of the kind of tissue collected with respect to disease status or proximity to tumor tissue.

properties.name: days_to_sample_procurement
properties.description: The number of days from the date the patient was diagnosed to the date of the procedure that produced the sample.

properties.name: freezing_method
properties.description: Text term that represents the method used for freezing the sample.

properties.name: preservation_method
properties.description: Text term that represents the method used to preserve the sample.

properties.name: days_to_collection
properties.description: Time interval from the date of biospecimen collection to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

properties.name: initial_weight
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the initial weight of the sample, measured in milligrams.

properties.name: longest_dimension
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the longest dimension of the sample, measured in millimeters.

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'sample' table.

properties.name: sample.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'sample' table.

nodes.name: diagnosis
nodes.description: Data from the investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

properties.name: year_of_diagnosis
properties.description: Numeric value to represent the year of an individual's initial pathologic diagnosis of melanoma.

properties.name: other_diagnosed_cancers
properties.description: List of other cancers that have been diagnosed to the same patient in a comma-separated string format.

properties.name: age_at_diagnosis
properties.description: Age at the time of diagnosis expressed in number of years since birth.

properties.name: number_of_primary_melanomas
properties.description: Times that the primary disease has been observed (i.e. number primary melanomas)

properties.name: case.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'case' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'diagnosis' table.

properties.name: diagnosis.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'diagnosis' table.

nodes.name: aliquot
nodes.description: Pertaining to a portion of the whole; any one of two or more samples of something, of the same volume or weight.

properties.name: aliquot_quantity
properties.description: The quantity in micrograms (ug) of the aliquot(s) derived from the analyte(s) shipped for sequencing and characterization.

properties.name: aliquot_volume
properties.description: The volume in microliters (ml) of the aliquot(s) derived from the analyte(s) shipped for sequencing and characterization.

properties.name: analyte_type_id
properties.description: A single letter code used to identify a type of molecular analyte.

properties.name: analyte_type
properties.description: Text term that represents the kind of molecular specimen analyte.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Weight in grams or volume in mL.

properties.name: concentration
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the concentration of an analyte or aliquot extracted from the sample or sample portion, measured in milligrams per milliliter.

properties.name: source_center
properties.description: Name of the center that provided the item.

properties.name: sample.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'sample' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'aliquot' table.

properties.name: aliquot.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'aliquot' table.

nodes.name: read_group
nodes.description: Sequencing reads from one lane of an NGS experiment.

properties.name: is_paired_end
properties.description: Are the reads paired end?

properties.name: base_caller_version
properties.description: Version of the base caller.

properties.name: read_group_name
properties.description: Read Group Name

properties.name: sequencing_date
properties.description: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

properties.name: instrument_model
properties.description: Numeric value that represents the sample dimension that is greater than the shortest dimension and less than the longest dimension, measured in millimeters.

properties.name: base_caller_name
properties.description: Name of the base caller.

properties.name: platform
properties.description: Name of the platform used to obtain data.

properties.name: sequencing_center
properties.description: Name of the center that provided the sequence files.

properties.name: experimental_strategy
properties.description: The sequencing strategy used to generate the data file.

properties.name: aliquot.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'aliquot' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'read_group' table.

properties.name: read_group.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'read_group' table.

nodes.name: read_group_qc
nodes.description: Collection of QC metrics after sequencing.

properties.name: percent_aligned
properties.description: The percent of reads with at least one reported alignment.

properties.name: adapter_content
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: encoding
properties.description: Version of ASCII encoding of quality values found in the file.

properties.name: per_base_sequence_quality
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: sequence_duplication_levels
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: fastq_name
properties.description: Names of FASTQs.

properties.name: basic_statistics
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: per_base_sequence_content
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: kmer_content
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: percent_gc_content
properties.description: The overall %GC of all bases in all sequences.

properties.name: total_sequences
properties.description: A count of the total number of sequences processed.

properties.name: workflow_type
properties.description: Generic name for the workflow used to analyze a data set.

properties.name: total_aligned_reads
properties.description: The total number of reads with at least one reported alignment.

properties.name: sequence_length_distribution
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: per_sequence_quality_score
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: per_tile_sequence_quality
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: per_sequence_gc_content
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: per_base_n_content
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.name: overrepresented_sequences
properties.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'submitted_aligned_reads' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'read_group_qc' table.

properties.description: Link to Github hash for the CWL workflow used.
